profile.name: Jake Vanderplas
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Google | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with expertise in JAX, NumPy, and Scipy. Passionate about contributing to open-source projects and driving innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Google
description: Developed and maintained multiple high-performance machine learning models using JAX and its ecosystem.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate AI/ML capabilities into Google's products.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for software development, testing, and deployment.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to open-source projects such as JAX, NumPy, and Scipy.
Developed and maintained personal projects like Pythonic Perambulations blog and Jupyter Notebook repository.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including JAX and NumPy.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve code quality.
